item.title: LaTeX, an Introduction
item.description: LaTeX (pronounced lay-tech) is a document preparation system that provides high-quality typesetting using the WYSIWYM ideology. Based on Donald E. Knuth’s TeX typesetting language, LaTeX was developed in 1985 by Leslie Lamport and has become a staple in academia. It has also become the required text processing language for many periodicals.
